comments.body: @parente apparently people will scream now if we do not add the license file. Please see https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/blob/master/recipes/example/meta.yaml#L42-L52 for an example.
Ah yes. Missed adding the file line. Should be there now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/jupyterhub/sudospawner
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Enables JupyterHub to spawn single-user notebook servers without being root
